description: The striker's hat-trick eliminated Brazil on the way to Italy's triumph in the competition in Spain.
title: Paolo Rossi, Italy's 1982 World Cup hero, dies aged 64
title_page: Paolo Rossi, Italy's 1982 World Cup hero, dies aged 64 - BBC News
maintext: She did not disclose the cause of his death. Italian media are reporting that he had a long illness.
